attributes.action: Commission a burial monument for Henry VIII
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On this the 500th anniversary of his accession to the throne it is a most fitting time and opportunity to mark the burial place of this great monarch with a suitably ornate and splendid monument rather than leave his resting place with only a memorial stone as it is now in Windsor St Georges Chapel. His present resting place is not fit for a Monarch.

rejection.details: We suggest you contact your local authority with your suggestion.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
